main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 29 February 1956 in Bongrock, New Jersey, when a civilian father and son observed an object similar to a basketball, yellow in color, about 2 feet in diameter, moving in the SW quadrant of the sky for fifty minutes.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for a substantial length of time, at fifty minutes.
The object was described as being similar to a basketball and yellow in color, with movement patterns of up and down and back and forth.
The conclusion drawn from the report was that there was insufficient data for evaluation, but the possibilities of it being a balloon, possibly an aircraft, or not an aircraft were mentioned.
There were no photographs present to document the sighting.
The report was sourced from a civilian, adding a layer of credibility to the observation.
sighted object: Yellow object similar to a basketball
